results.title: Abridge AI Inc. Executive Team and Leadership Overview - Exa
results.content: Abridge AI Inc. is a leading healthcare technology company founded in 2018, specializing in AI-driven solutions that convert patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes. This diverse expertise drives Abridge AI Inc.'s mission to integrate advanced technology into clinical settings, while fostering a culture of innovation, operational excellence, and positive impact in healthcare. As CEO and Co-Founder of Abridge AI Inc., Shivdev Rao leads the company in developing advanced AI technology for healthcare documentation, championing solutions that empower clinicians and improve patient engagement at scale. The Abridge AI Inc. leadership team brings together clinical insight, advanced AI research, and operational excellence to pioneer healthcare documentation transformation. Together, the Abridge AI Inc. management team and founders have positioned the company as a leader in healthcare technology.
